content.prompt: In the work shown, the use of overlapping vertical and diagonal lines suggests

choices.label: the proportions of the human form

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
